name: Stop Sign
description: A red, octagonal sign instructing vehicles to stop.
purpose: Ensure safety at intersections.
instructions: Stop completely behind stop lines or crosswalks.
penalties: Failure to stop may result in penalties.

name: Yield Sign
description: A triangular sign instructing drivers to yield.
purpose: Near intersections and merging zones.
instructions: Yield to oncoming traffic and pedestrians.
penalties: Violating this sign results in accidents.

name: Speed Limit Sign
description: Indicates the speed limit on the road.
purpose: Maintain safe speed according to road signs.
instructions: Do not exceed the speed indicated on the sign.
penalties: Penalties include fines and license suspension.

name: No Parking Sign
description: Indicates areas where parking is prohibited.
purpose: Prevent traffic congestion and improve road flow.
instructions: Parking restricted based on time and location.
penalties: Violating this sign may result in fines and towing.

name: No Entry Sign
description: Indicates restricted entry areas for vehicles.
purpose: Commonly placed at restricted entry points.
instructions: Driving through these areas can result in penalties.
penalties: Follow road signs for proper vehicle movement.

name: Pedestrian Crossing Sign
description: Warns drivers of an upcoming crosswalk.
purpose: Near school zones and pedestrian crossings.
instructions: Drivers must reduce speed and yield to pedestrians.
penalties: Failing to stop may result in penalties.

name: School Crossing Sign
description: Warns drivers of school crossings ahead.
purpose: Placed near schools, bus stops, and crosswalks.
instructions: Drivers must stop to allow children to cross safely.
penalties: Failing to stop could result in severe penalties.

name: Bicycle Crossing Sign
description: Indicates areas where bicycles cross the road.
purpose: Near bike lanes and crossings.
instructions: Drivers should yield to bicycles crossing the street.
penalties: Disregarding this sign can result in accidents.

name: One-Way Sign
description: Indicates roads with one-way traffic only.
purpose: Placed on narrow streets and main roads.
instructions: Drivers must follow the direction of traffic flow.
penalties: Going against this sign results in accidents.

name: U-Turn Prohibited Sign
description: Indicates that U-turns are prohibited.
purpose: Commonly seen at intersections and curves.
instructions: U-turns should not be attempted in restricted areas.
penalties: Non-compliance could result in traffic violations.

name: Construction Zone Sign
description: Indicates areas with ongoing road construction.
purpose: Commonly placed near construction sites.
instructions: Slow down and observe all road construction instructions.
penalties: Disregarding this sign can result in accidents.

name: Slow Down Sign
description: Advises vehicles to reduce speed.
purpose: Commonly placed near intersections, schools, and curves.
instructions: Reduce speed to ensure safety for pedestrians and vehicles.
penalties: Disregarding this sign can result in collisions.

name: No Right Turn Sign
description: Indicates that right turns are prohibited.
purpose: Placed near intersections or roads where right turns are restricted.
instructions: Drivers must not turn right at the indicated area.
penalties: Failing to comply may result in fines or accidents.

name: No Left Turn Sign
description: Indicates that left turns are prohibited.
purpose: Commonly seen at intersections or roads with restricted left turns.
instructions: Drivers must not turn left at the indicated area.
penalties: Violating this sign may result in penalties or accidents.

name: No Overtaking Sign
description: Indicates that overtaking is not allowed on this road.
purpose: Placed on roads with narrow lanes, sharp turns, or limited visibility.
instructions: Drivers must not overtake other vehicles where this sign is displayed.
penalties: Violating this sign increases the risk of accidents and penalties.

name: Warning Sign
description: Alerts drivers to potential hazards ahead.
purpose: Placed near dangerous curves, steep slopes, or accident-prone areas.
instructions: Drivers must reduce speed and proceed with caution.
penalties: Ignoring this sign increases the risk of accidents.

name: Railroad Sign
description: Indicates a railroad crossing ahead.
purpose: Placed near train tracks to alert drivers and pedestrians.
instructions: Drivers must stop and look for approaching trains before proceeding.
penalties: Failure to stop can result in collisions with trains.

name: Animal Crossing Sign
description: Warns drivers about the potential presence of animals crossing the road.
purpose: Placed near forests, farms, or wildlife crossing areas.
instructions: Drivers must slow down and be vigilant for animals on the road.
penalties: Failing to comply may result in harm to wildlife or accidents.

name: Slippery Road Sign
description: Warns drivers of slippery road conditions.
purpose: Commonly placed near bridges, curves, or areas prone to wet or icy conditions.
instructions: Drivers should reduce speed and avoid sudden braking or sharp turns.
penalties: Ignoring this sign may lead to skidding or loss of control.

name: Steep Hill Road Sign
description: Indicates a steep incline or decline ahead.
purpose: Typically placed on roads with sharp elevation changes.
instructions: Drivers should adjust their speed and use appropriate gears.
penalties: Failing to prepare may result in brake failure or accidents.

name: Sharp Curve Sign
description: Warns drivers of a sharp curve ahead.
purpose: Placed before sharp turns to ensure drivers reduce speed.
instructions: Drivers should approach the curve with caution and maintain control.
penalties: Ignoring this sign increases the risk of rollover or skidding.

name: Falling Rocks Sign
description: Warns drivers of areas prone to falling rocks or debris.
purpose: Commonly placed near cliffs, mountainous roads, or unstable terrains.
instructions: Drivers should proceed with caution and avoid stopping unnecessarily.
penalties: Failure to heed this sign may result in damage or injury.

name: Road Narrows Ahead Sign
description: Indicates that the road ahead narrows.
purpose: Placed before sections where lanes reduce or the road becomes narrower.
instructions: Drivers must slow down and yield when necessary.
penalties: Failing to comply may cause collisions in tight spaces.

name: Bicycles Crossing Sign
description: Alerts drivers to areas where bicycles may cross the road.
purpose: Typically placed near bike paths or shared roadways.
instructions: Drivers must yield to bicycles and exercise caution.
penalties: Failure to follow this sign may endanger cyclists.

name: Guide and Information Sign
description: Provides guidance and general information for drivers.
purpose: Found near intersections, tourist areas, or highways.
instructions: Drivers should use the information to navigate or plan routes.
penalties: Ignoring this sign may lead to missed exits or confusion.

name: Exit Sign
description: Indicates the location of an exit from a roadway.
placement: Typically placed on highways or major roads.
instructions: Drivers should prepare to exit safely and reduce speed as required.
consequences: Failing to comply may result in missing the exit or accidents.

name: Rest Area Sign
description: Indicates the presence of a rest area ahead.
placement: Found on highways and long-distance routes.
instructions: Drivers can use this area to rest, use facilities, or refuel.
consequences: Ignoring this sign might lead to driver fatigue, which increases accident risk.

name: Hospital Sign
description: Indicates the location of a nearby hospital.
placement: Placed near hospitals or medical facilities.
instructions: Drivers should reduce noise (e.g., no honking) and drive cautiously.
consequences: Failing to comply might disrupt medical services or emergency care.

name: Fuel Station Sign
description: Indicates the location of the nearest fuel station.
placement: Found along highways or near fuel stations.
instructions: Drivers should plan refueling accordingly.
consequences: Ignoring this sign may result in running out of fuel.

name: Parking Area Sign
description: Indicates the availability of a designated parking area.
placement: Found in urban areas, tourist spots, or highway stops.
instructions: Drivers can park their vehicles in the marked area.
consequences: Parking elsewhere might result in fines or towing.

name: Distance Marker Sign
description: Indicates the distance to nearby cities or landmarks.
placement: Found along highways or major roads.
instructions: Drivers can use this information for navigation and trip planning.
consequences: Ignoring this sign might cause confusion about travel distances.

name: City Limit Sign
description: Marks the beginning or end of a city's boundary.
placement: Placed at city entrances or exits.
instructions: Drivers should adjust their speed and follow city-specific rules.
consequences: Failure to comply may result in speeding violations or fines.

name: Airport Sign
description: Indicates the direction or location of an airport.
placement: Placed near airports or highways leading to them.
instructions: Drivers can follow this sign for airport access.
consequences: Missing this sign may result in delays or route confusion.

name: Detour Sign
description: Indicates an alternate route due to road closures or construction.
placement: Placed near road work zones or diversions.
instructions: Drivers must follow the detour route indicated.
consequences: Ignoring this sign may lead to dead ends or traffic violations.

name: Highway Sign
description: Indicates the number or name of a highway.
placement: Found at highway entrances and exits.
instructions: Drivers can use this sign for navigation and trip planning.
consequences: Missing this sign might result in taking the wrong route.

name: Temporary Construction Sign
description: Warns of temporary construction or maintenance ahead.
placement: Placed in work zones or areas under repair.
instructions: Drivers should reduce speed and follow instructions.
consequences: Ignoring this sign may result in accidents or fines.

name: Road Work Ahead Sign
description: Warns drivers of upcoming road work or construction zones.
placement: Placed in advance of construction areas.
instructions: Drivers should reduce speed and exercise caution.
consequences: Failure to comply might lead to accidents or traffic penalties.

name: Lane End Sign
description: Indicates that a lane is ending ahead.
placement: Placed before sections where a lane merges or ends.
instructions: Drivers must merge safely into the adjacent lane.
consequences: Ignoring this sign might result in collisions or traffic violations.

name: Under Construction Sign
description: Warns drivers of an area currently under construction.
placement: Placed near construction zones or road maintenance areas.
instructions: Drivers should slow down, follow instructions, and be prepared for potential detours.
consequences: Ignoring this sign may result in accidents, fines, or delays due to unsafe driving near the construction zone.
